The formations seem to be of natural origin and not placed, but the [0m [37msurrounding area does not have similar formations. Between the large rocks, is a[0m [37mbed of gravel and rough stones, mostly grey granite and some black haematite. [0m [37mDry grasses have shot up between the gravel and blow gently in the wind. To the [0m [37mnorth, the path climbs a gentle slope to the entrance of the massive mausoleum [0m [37mwhich rests on top of the hill. The building is of glassy smooth dark grey [0m [37mstone, cubic in shape, roughly thirty feet on a side, with a black domed roof. [0m [37mSix of the jagged rock formations shoot up around the sides of the building, and[0m [37meach of these is partially chiselled to resemble an armoured knight down to the [0m [37mwaist, while the rest is unhewn rock. The figures twist their forms to fit the [0m [37mnatural form of the rock spires. One can only speculate on whether the figures [0m [37mare meant to be emerging from the rock, or entering it.[36m A massive iron statue of[0m [36mAegis, the God of War, looms here. Overflowing with blood and other trophies of [0m [36mthe dead, a sacrificial altar to the Lord of Warfare has been erected nearby. A [0m [36mswarm of bees hovers menacingly nearby.[1;36m Oat Vallah-Kindfire, Rune Ace is here. [0m [1;36mHe wields a steel shortsword in each hand. [37mcexkdb- [1;30m([0;37m20[1;30m:[0;37m6[1;30m:[0;37m49[1;30m:[0;37m937[1;30m)[0;53ml[0m [33mA rock garden at the foot of a hill.[1;31m ([0mCentral Wilderness[1;31m)[0m [36mThe stars twinkle in the clear night sky. The ground is slick with ice.[37m The path[0m [37mwinding through this rock garden and up to the mausoleum is lined with knee [0m [37mhigh, gnarled shrubs, twisting this way and that as if trying to uproot [0m [37mthemselves. The path leads in and around several large rust coloured rock [0m [37mformations that extrude jaggedly up from the dry ground like massive stone [0m [37mteeth. The formations seem to be of natural origin and not placed, but the [0m [37msurrounding area does not have similar formations. Between the large rocks, is a[0m [37mbed of gravel and rough stones, mostly grey granite and some black haematite. [0m [37mDry grasses have shot up between the gravel and blow gently in the wind. To the [0m [37mnorth, the path climbs a gentle slope to the entrance of the massive mausoleum [0m [37mwhich rests on top of the hill. The building is of glassy smooth dark grey [0m [37mstone, cubic in shape, roughly thirty feet on a side, with a black domed roof. [0m [37mSix of the jagged rock formations shoot up around the sides of the building, and[0m [37meach of these is partially chiselled to resemble an armoured knight down to the [0m [37mwaist, while the rest is unhewn rock. The figures twist their forms to fit the [0m [37mnatural form of the rock spires. One can only speculate on whether the figures [0m [37mare meant to be emerging from the rock, or entering it.[36m A massive iron statue of[0m [36mAegis, the God of War, looms here. Overflowing with blood and other trophies of [0m [36mthe dead, a sacrificial altar to the Lord of Warfare has been erected nearby. A [0m [36mswarm of bees hovers menacingly nearby.[1;36m Oat Vallah-Kindfire, Rune Ace is here, [0m [1;36msprawled on the floor. He wields a steel shortsword in each hand. Mr. Fauscht [0m [1;36mTav'Elaon, Shadow Stalker is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption [0m [1;36mbearing the city arms of Ashtan in his left hand and a dwarven battleaxe in his [0m [1;36mright.[0m [1;34mYou see exits leading north and southeast.[0m [1;31m([1;30mp[1;31m) [0m4367h, [1;33m1272m, [0m19072e, 11256w [37mcexkdb- [1;30m([0;37m20[1;30m:[0;37m6[1;30m:[0;37m50[1;30m:[0;37m640[1;30m)[0m [37mYou feel the slime attacking your physical well-being with its foul presence.[0m [1;31m([1;30mp[1;31m) [0m4149h, [1;33m1272m, [0m19072e, 11256w [37mcexkdb- [1;30m([0;37m20[1;30m:[0;37m6[1;30m:[0;37m50[1;30m:[0;37m640[1;30m)[0;53mpp[0m [1;37m[[1;34mVadi[1;37m]: System unpaused.[0m 4149h, [1;33m1272m, [0m19072e, 11256w [37mcexkdb- [1;30m([0;37m20[1;30m:[0;37m6[1;30m:[0;37m50[1;30m:[0;37m703[1;30m)[0m [37mThe bubonis entity secretes a foul, slick substance that covers you.[1;34m ([1;37msmoke valerian[1;34m)[0m 4367h, [1;33m1272m, [0m19072e, 11268w [37mcexkdb- [1;30m([0;37m20[1;30m:[0;37m6[1;30m:[0;37m51[1;30m:[0;37m31[1;30m)[0m [37mFauscht takes some salve from a vial and rubs it on his skin.[0m 4367h, [1;33m1272m, [0m19072e, 11268w [37mcexkdb- [1;30m([0;37m20[1;30m:[0;37m6[1;30m:[0;37m51[1;30m:[0;37m140[1;30m)[0;53ml[0m [37mYou take a long drag off your pipe.[0m [37mYour glands cease their oily secretion.[0m 4367h, [1;33m1272m, [0m19072e, 11268w [37mcexkdb-[0m ([1;37mslickness[1;34m -[0m)[37m [1;30m([0;37m20[1;30m:[0;37m6[1;30m:[0;37m51[1;30m:[0;37m312[1;30m)[0m [37mYour mind is able to focus once again.[0m 4367h, [1;33m1272m, [0m19072e, 11268w [37mcexkdb- [1;30m([0;37m20[1;30m:[0;37m6[1;30m:[0;37m51[1;30m:[0;37m312[1;30m)[0m [33mA rock garden at the foot of a hill.[1;31m ([0mCentral Wilderness[1;31m)[0m [36mThe stars twinkle in the clear night sky. The ground is slick with ice.[37m The path[0m [37mwinding through this rock garden and up to the mausoleum is lined with knee [0m [37mhigh, gnarled shrubs, twisting this way and that as if trying to uproot [0m [37mthemselves. The path leads in and around several large rust coloured rock [0m [37mformations that extrude jaggedly up from the dry ground like massive stone [0m [37mteeth. The formations seem to be of natural origin and not placed, but the [0m [37msurrounding area does not have similar formations. Between the large rocks, is a[0m [37mbed of gravel and rough stones, mostly grey granite and some black haematite. [0m [37mDry grasses have shot up between the gravel and blow gently in the wind. The formations seem to be of natural origin and not placed, but the [0m [37msurrounding area does not have similar formations. Between the large rocks, is a[0m [37mbed of gravel and rough stones, mostly grey granite and some black haematite. [0m [37mDry grasses have shot up between the gravel and blow gently in the wind. To the [0m [37mnorth, the path climbs a gentle slope to the entrance of the massive mausoleum [0m [37mwhich rests on top of the hill. The building is of glassy smooth dark grey [0m [37mstone, cubic in shape, roughly thirty feet on a side, with a black domed roof. [0m [37mSix of the jagged rock formations shoot up around the sides of the building, and[0m [37meach of these is partially chiselled to resemble an armoured knight down to the [0m [37mwaist, while the rest is unhewn rock. [1;30m([0;37m20[1;30m:[0;37m8[1;30m:[0;37m7[1;30m:[0;37m781[1;30m)[0;53ml[0m [33mA rock garden at the foot of a hill.[1;31m ([0mCentral Wilderness[1;31m)[0m [36mThe stars twinkle in the clear night sky. The ground is slick with ice.[37m The path[0m [37mwinding through this rock garden and up to the mausoleum is lined with knee [0m [37mhigh, gnarled shrubs, twisting this way and that as if trying to uproot [0m [37mthemselves. The path leads in and around several large rust coloured rock [0m [37mformations that extrude jaggedly up from the dry ground like massive stone [0m [37mteeth. The formations seem to be of natural origin and not placed, but the [0m [37msurrounding area does not have similar formations. Between the large rocks, is a[0m [37mbed of gravel and rough stones, mostly grey granite and some black haematite. [0m [37mDry grasses have shot up between the gravel and blow gently in the wind. To the [0m [37mnorth, the path climbs a gentle slope to the entrance of the massive mausoleum [0m [37mwhich rests on top of the hill. The building is of glassy smooth dark grey [0m [37mstone, cubic in shape, roughly thirty feet on a side, with a black domed roof. [0m [37mSix of the jagged rock formations shoot up around the sides of the building, and[0m [37meach of these is partially chiselled to resemble an armoured knight down to the [0m [37mwaist, while the rest is unhewn rock. The figures twist their forms to fit the [0m [37mnatural form of the rock spires. One can only speculate on whether the figures [0m [37mare meant to be emerging from the rock, or entering it.[36m A massive iron statue of[0m [36mAegis, the God of War, looms here. Overflowing with blood and other trophies of [0m [36mthe dead, a sacrificial altar to the Lord of Warfare has been erected nearby. A [0m [36mswarm of bees hovers menacingly nearby. The twisted remains of Fauscht lie here.[0m [36mA bloodroot leaf lies here.[1;36m Oat Vallah-Kindfire, Rune Ace is here, sprawled on [0m [1;36mthe floor.
